Author: eusman
Content:
Brin "We really started to grow (Google) during the bust of the dot com bubble," he said. "Their timing may be somewhat inverted." Google, he said, benefited from the discipline imposed on it by the bust. "I think that's an extra challenge that they face," he added"

it's obvious he is considering Facebook overvalued

Author: youngnh
Content: wrong. The sum of an infinite geometric series is a finite sum. If an infinite parade of new languages each drag us halfway to lisp eventually we'll all be programming in it
